about_the_game:
Tear the World of Dreams to Pieces!

In this indie puzzle game, you take on the role of Ksari, the god of dreams. Your task is to deconstruct dreams into pieces, like a reverse puzzle, and then assemble new ones from these pieces, helping sleeping characters understand themselves and overcome life challenges. The game combines a cute yet slightly eerie atmosphere and a storyline presented in comic book style.

Game Features:

  • Unique Mechanics: Not only do you search for items, but you also deconstruct dreams into components to find all hidden elements.

  • Deep Storyline: Each dream is a unique story where you, along with Ksari, help characters overcome their inner conflicts and find their way.

  • Distinct Visual Style: Hand-drawn illustrations and an engaging comic book style give the game a special atmosphere.

The World of Dreams Awaits!

Help characters find answers to important questions and experience an unforgettable journey through their dreams.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a world of cute and eerie dreams! Find, deconstruct, and assemble the thoughts and desires of the characters. Go through all the stages of personal development by helping the sleepers find answers.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian
